data.name: Happy Anime Puzzle
data.detailed_description:
Happy Anime Puzzle is a great jigsaw puzzle for beautiful girls. Every beautiful girl is a high-quality picture, which absolutely brightens your eyes.


Although it's a traditional jigsaw jigsaw puzzle, Happy Anime Puzzle creates a relaxed and pleasant jigsaw atmosphere and guarantees a smooth game experience.


The game includes:


20 game levels

Six Quadratic Diagrams of Girls

Wonderful Background Music



Thank you for buying!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Due E6300 or AMD althon X2 5000+
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 7300GT or ATI X1600
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Due Q6600 or AMD Althon X4 635
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX760 or ATI R7 260X
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Puzzle games, pictures will contain sexy beauty pictures, pictures have some sexual hints, but do not contain other dew points and pornographic content.
